parameters.name: CaSn
parameters.description: The SN serial number of the CA certificate to be queried, indicating which CA certificate's registered device certificates are to be retrieved.

parameters.name: MqttInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID bound to the CA certificate, which is the instance ID of the MQTT version of the cloud message queue.

parameters.name: PageNo
parameters.description: Indicates the page number of the returned results. The starting page is counted from 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of query records to display per page. Value range: 1 to 100.
